author: Sam Mcneil
title: Wuhan embraces Yangtze River as virus-hit city reopens
description: WUHAN, China (AP) — Bathed in golden late-afternoon light, Chen Enting snapped a photo of his ticket to commemorate his first ferry ride across the Yangtze River after a 76-day quarantine ended in...
content:
WUHAN, China (AP) Bathed in golden late-afternoon light, Chen Enting snapped a photo of his ticket to commemorate his first ferry ride across the Yangtze River after a 76-day quarantine ended in the Chinese city where the coronavirus pandemic began.
The reop… [+6043 chars]
